name: shabby
content:
shabby adjective
(BAD CONDITION)
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 looking old and in bad condition because of being used for a long time or not being cared for: He wore a shabby old overcoat. Her home is a rented one-bedroom apartment in a shabby part of town. The refugees were shabby (= wore old clothes in bad condition) and hungry.
